Room Information

1 Bed | 50 sq m | 538 sq ft

336-474 square feet, WIFI available with wireless printing, 42-inch HD TV, and MP3 alarm clock as well as hairdryer, iron, and coffeemaker, large work desk & ergonomic chair and laptop safes.

Need assistance? Our dedicated reservations team is available around the clock:

Gates South Beach Service Centre 800-445-8667 or
info@gatessouthbeach.com
